General.Name: Lypsa Gems & Jewellery Limited
General.Description: Lypsa Gems & Jewellery Limited engages in the manufacturing and trading of diamonds in India. The company was formerly known as Maloo Gems & Jewellery Limited and changed its name to Lypsa Gems & Jewellery Limited in August 2011. Lypsa Gems & Jewellery Limited was incorporated in 1995 and is based in Mumbai, India.
